name: The Photocopier
description:
The Photocopier is an extremely incomplete first-person horror game that was attempted for the 2022 Horrorjam.

I ended up biting off way more than I could chew and so this version is currently just a map, with a key and a door. Not much, but I'm happy with the consistent effort I put in and, though there isn't much game in the game, I'm happy with the mood of the current piece.

I'm looking forward to putting something in that actually counts as 'horror' in future releases!

Typecast font provided by fontenddev.com
